@PwC_AU
 modelling #domesticviolence actually costs the Cth Govt alone $6 bil pa (that‚Äôs just the $$ hit it takes, leaving aside cost to victims, employers & state govts) & yet only spends $110 mil pa on its plan to address it? How can this possibly meet the task?Quote Tweet

@womenssafetynsw
 ¬∑ Aug 7
According to @PwC modelling, the majority of this ‚Äúeconomic‚Äù cost of #DomesticViolence is borne by victims of violence (31%), then the Commonwealth Govt (26%), then society/community (14%), then state govts (10%), children (7%), perpetrators (6%), employers (6%) & insurers (1%).
